title: Person of Interest - 4x22 - The Correction
author: YT.POI
comment:
0:12 ''Splendid. Then burn down the tree :))''

Greer's smirk is one of the best things on this show.
The reveal of what the Correction actually was has me concerned. Without spoiling it, generally it's the sort of thing that only happens when a show is heading into it's final season.

This show could've been 10 times better with Control and Greer..but unfortunately one of them is a recurring character who rarely appears, and the other one is a guest star. My favorite seasons are the first two seasons, but in my opinion the second half of season 3 is incredibly good and it's because of Greer, Control, and Collier.
description:
